org.jbiowh.core.dbms.mysql

Class WHMySQL

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jbiowh.core.dbms.mysql.WHMySQL
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    WHDBMSFactory

    public class WHMySQL
extends Object
implements WHDBMSFactory
    This class handled the system connections using MySQL driver $Author: r78v10a07@gmail.com $ $LastChangedDate: 2012-08-31 15:46:36 +0200 (Fri, 31 Aug 2012) $ $LastChangedRevision: 231 $
    Since:
    Jun 17, 2011

      • WHMySQL

        public WHMySQL(String driver,
       String url,
       String dbuser,
       String dbpasswd)
        The class to handled the MySQL DBMS. This constructor set the needed parameters
        Parameters:
        driver - the connection driver (com.mysql.jdbc.Driver)
        url - the connection URL (jdbc:mysql://:3306/)
        dbuser - the database user
        dbpasswd - the database password

      • splitField

        public void splitField(PrintWriter tofile,
              String sql,
              String field1header,
              String field2header,
              String separator)
        This metho split the field2header field returned on the sql sentence into a string array repeating the field1header
        Specified by:
        splitField in interface WHDBMSFactory
        Parameters:
        tofile - File to print the split result
        sql - SQL sentence with return two field
        field1header - Field name
        field2header - Field name
        separator - Separator of data into field2header

      • splitField

        public void splitField(PrintWriter tofile,
              String sql,
              String field1header,
              String field2header,
              String separator1,
              String separator2)
        This metho split the field2header field returned on the sql sentence into a string array repeating the field1header. Each array element is split again into two fields using the separator2
        Specified by:
        splitField in interface WHDBMSFactory
        Parameters:
        tofile - File to print the split result
        sql - SQL sentence with return two field
        field1header - Field name
        field2header - Field name
        separator1 - Separator of data into field2header
        separator2 - Internal data separator into two fields
